creator: josh@apache.org
text:
HSSFCell.getCellFormula() throws IllegalStateException when invoked on a cell with a formula that has a leading space. (e.g. "= 4")


Note - HSSFCell.setCellFormula(String) strips spaces, so that method will not show this bug.  The bug can easily be observed using spreadsheets created by Excel.

Created attachment 21671
svn diff of 3 changed files

text: Thanks for this Josh, applied to svn trunk
